definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Scholars vary their opinions on the connections between Confucius and Mao Zedong.
sentences.chinese: 他们之间有何关联，论者众说纷纭。

sentences.english: It is showing no difference for basic concept of school mental - health education.
sentences.chinese: 中小学心理健康教育的基本概念众说纷纭，莫衷一是。

sentences.english: Opinions vary on the family life of the scientist.
sentences.chinese: 有关这位科学家的家庭生活，众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Throughout Shu-shan Wen-hai, with regard to the interpretation of love can be described are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 纵观书山文海，关于爱情的诠释可谓是众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Have wide divided opinio regarding the oil price rises primary cause and the countermeasure people.
sentences.chinese: 对于油价上涨的主要原因和对策人们众说纷纭。

sentences.english: This fire was no doubt caused by arson.
sentences.chinese: 关于起火原因及纵火者，至今众说纷纭。

sentences.english: After the fall of Small Swords Society Uprising, opinions vary on the whereabouts of Liu Lichuan.
sentences.chinese: 小刀会起义失败后，刘丽川的下落历来众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Opinions vary about the origin and historical development of Tanci.
sentences.chinese: 关于弹词的渊源流变，历来众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Opinions about Wedding ceremony at dusk has been widely explained since Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自汉以来，亲迎之礼何以“昏以为期”众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Opinions vary on why this happened.
sentences.chinese: 中国的政策为何会发生这样的转变，一直众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Up till now opinions are divided as to the cause of the fire and who was the arsonist.
sentences.chinese: 关于起火原因及纵火者，至今众说纷纭。

sentences.english: And people from Ho's, opinion, is estimated by the ancient Turkic .
sentences.chinese: 而人出自何年代，众说纷纭，估计是古代突厥所为。

sentences.english: This hand blown glass bead has Blue and white swirled flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这手吹玻璃珠有蓝色和白色的花朵众说纷纭。

sentences.english: As to what it means, opinions vary.
sentences.chinese: 对该裁决的含义，众说纷纭。

sentences.english: There are always different opinions about the annotation of Hemp on Hill.
sentences.chinese: 对《丘中有麻》的诠释历来众说纷纭。

sentences.english: because our nation's going through so many different viewpoints of it.
sentences.chinese: 因为在我们的国家，人们对这个问题众说纷纭。

definition: unable to reach a decision (idiom); cannot agree on the right choice/no unanimous decision/still a matter of discussion
each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout
(of a body of people) to offer all kinds of different opinions (idiom)/to argue endlessly
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
The benevolent sees benevolence, the wise sees wisdom./Different views are admissible. (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 zhe3 jian4 ren2 , zhi4 zhe3 jian4 zhi4

definition: pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
